bibdata.abstract: Interfaces and service access points defined in IEEE Std 1900.4â„¢ are described in detail, enabling distributed decision making in heterogeneous wireless networks and obtaining context information for this decision making.

Interfaces and service access points defined in IEEE Std 1900.4TM are described in detail, enabling distributed decision making in heterogeneous wireless networks and obtaining context information for this decision making.
